1. Aries - 8/10 - Natural risk-takers and action-seekers, Aries tend to excel at making bold financial moves.
2. Taurus - 6/10 - Prudent and cautious, Tauruses are more likely to invest in stable assets and avoid risks.
3. Gemini - 7/10 - Quick-witted and adaptable, Geminis have a knack for identifying profitable opportunities but may struggle with long-term planning.
4. Cancer - 5/10 - Emotionally driven decisions can lead to impulsive financial choices, but Cancers are naturally empathetic and can excel at investing in people-oriented projects.
5. Leo - 9/10 - Confident and charismatic, Leos tend to thrive in high-stakes environments and often take calculated risks to achieve their goals.
6. Virgo - 4/10 - Analytical and detail-oriented, Virgos may struggle with self-doubt and overthink financial decisions, but are excellent at finding flaws in investments.
7. Libra - 8/10 - Diplomatic and balanced, Librans have a natural talent for negotiating deals and mediating conflicts, which can serve them well in finance.
8. Scorpio - 9/10 - Intensely focused and perceptive, Scorpios can sniff out hidden opportunities and make calculated moves to achieve their goals.
9. Sagittarius - 6/10 - Adventurous and optimistic, Sagittarians tend to take bold financial leaps but may struggle with long-term planning and responsible decision-making.
10. Capricorn - 7/10 - Disciplined and practical, Capricorns are naturally good at budgeting and planning for the future, but may need to work on taking calculated risks.
11. Aquarius - 8/10 - Humanitarian and innovative, Aquarians often excel at finding unconventional solutions and investing in socially responsible projects.

12. Pisces - 5/10 - Empathetic and imaginative, Pisces can struggle with making rational financial decisions due to their emotional connections, but are naturally good at investing in people-oriented ventures.
